caption.p: Cidofovir (CDV) mitigates Ad6-induced morbidity. ( A) Body weight changes. Each symbol represents the group mean; the error bars depict the standard error of the mean. Ad6-Vehicle v. Ad6-CDV p < 0.0001 (two-way ANOVA); ( B) Virus burden in the lungs. Each symbol represents the value from an individual animal; the horizontal bar signifies the mean. Ad6-Vehicle v. Ad6-CDV p = 0.5556 (Mannâ€“Whitney U test).
